text:
Heading: Market Research Analysis: Fin Tech-Enabled D2C Farm Products in Tamil Nadu, India
Subheading: Competitive Analysis
Traditional Markets vs. D2C Models: Farmers are shifting from middlemen-driven supply chains to direct sales through digital platforms. Local vs. National Players: Tamil Nadu has strong local agri-cooperatives competing with national-level Fin Tech and e-commerce players. Differentiation Strategies: Leveraging AI, blockchain, and embedded finance to create farmer-centric trust models and efficient supply chains.
